***************************
almasru documentation |doc|
***************************

How to import modules
---------------------

.. code-block:: python

    # Import libraries
   from almasru import SruClient, SruRecord, SruRequest, config_log
   from almasru import check_removable_records

    # Config logs
    config_log()

Contents
--------

   :maxdepth: 1

   srurequest
   sruclient
   srurecord
   configlog
